name: render aggregate_metric_double when missing min and max

body.query:
FROM test4
| EVAL a = TO_AGGREGATE_METRIC_DOUBLE(1)  // Temporary workaround to enable aggregate_metric_double
| KEEP agg_metric

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.3.0-c3cc3d1d1464051f301c8eaa192360b5e032cfd4 "No limit defined, adding default limit of [1000]"
